content.detailedDescription: Out feeding horses late and looked up near the treeline to see leave round lights were none have ever been before. three lights appeared in triangle pattern. large glowing orange orbs flashed and twinkled like stars or flame. moved into flat line pattern.  started to have lights go out into one. then back to two and finally back to three. this went on for quite some time.  then they were gone.   after a few minutes 12 lights appeared in a large oval like mass. this lasted a minute or so then they disappeared.  got in truck to see if they were from a work site or something to make us feel better. . no such luck.
content.summary: Glowing orb light in triangular pattern over murrieta area

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing, looking at the milky way to the se. caught a light to my right, to the west. three strong orangeish,redish, large lights in triangular formation over the hills, possibly over the ocean. looked at them for about 1 minute and then they just turned off. looked for about 1 minute and then pop,pop,pop, about 15 lights appeared. some where more bright than others but all were yellow/orangish/redish. stayed on about 1.5 minutes and then one by one they went dark. within about 15 seconds of each other.

there is a subtle white shroud/cloud residual formation where the lights were, the only clouds in the whole sky.

the lights were larger than the adjacent stars. i noticed aircraft lights, which is usual in our skies, as if nothing at all had happen. for me, this is life changing.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle. blackness 1 minute. 15-18 lights in formation.

content.detailedDescription: We were watering the lawn and happened to see 3 orangy red orbs flashing off and on then the one on the right disappeared then the 2 others. one half a minute later 30 showed up in their place same color but in an ovally round shape with 30 or more evenly spaced in that shape.Ine drifted diwn to the left and within 3 minutes all disappeared. one showed up after that and we went inside. my sisters family witnessed it also at their house.
content.summary: 3glowing orbs disappeared and 30  took their place

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on a suburban street in austin, texas at 9:25pm i observed what appeared to be a square low-flying object approaching me from the east. there were four unwavering lights, 2 red and 2 yellow. there was very little space between the lights, giving the appearance of a compact square. strangely, it seemed that one of the sides was its leading edge, not one of the angles. i slowed down to get a better look. as the object flew over me, i watched it in the rear view mirror until it was no longer visible. 

i turned right and drove about 1/4 mile south, stopping at the mailboxes on the corner to retrieve the day's mail. as i was getting out of the car, i noticed what appeared to be the same object, but now coming from the south (i.E., from behind me). it seemed to be about 300 feet in altitude and traveling about 25 mph. it made a slight humming noise. i watched as it flew above me and continued south until it again disappeared from sight, about 1/4 mile further south.

at first i thought it might be a model airplane, but the lights were too big and the hum was not characteristic of any model airplane i've ever been near. plus, i've never known model airplanes to be flown in the evening. i discounted the possibility of small aircraft due to the non-blinking lights and lack of noise. i wondered if it was a drone, but since they are used for strictly military purposes - as far as i know - i didn't think they would have lights. further, the square appearance and the fact that it was traveling with one of the sides forward, not one of the corner angles, seems curiously non-aerodynamic. i kept searching my mind for an explanation but, having come up with nothing, decided to file this report.
content.summary: While driving east on sesbania, ufo approached from west; then heading south on gatling gun ufo approached from north.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed home from the grocery store at 10:53 pm and was at the corner of fm 518 and mapleleaf dr.  i observed a bright red glowing object in the sky towards the northeast and it appeared to be hovering.  it was approximately 500 foot above the ground. there was no sound coming from the object.  it was not a helicopter or an airplane. i have worked in the airline business for the last 14 years and i am very familiar with aircrafts.  i stopped my car and got out. i attempted to video tape the object but nothing showed up on my screen.  i watched the object hover for about 5 minutes and then it took off straight into the sky in a northeastern direction. i am absolutely positive that this was not any kind of aircraft that i have ever seen, nor did it maneuver like anything that i am familiar with.  when the object left my eyesight, it was so quick and went straight up.  please feel free to contact me, i have never witnessed anything like this in my life.
content.summary: Observed fireball glowing and hovering. i got out of my car and watched it for 5 minutes before it took off into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: One objet like a star blurred , no any str in the sky , i cant take fotograpy only visible at human eyes
content.summary: One objet like a star blurred , no any str in the sky , i cant take fotograpy only visible at human eyes

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a silver cylinder object flying with no wings. it made no sound. it flew in a straight line. no flume except when it went into a light cloud, i  saw a  flume but after it cleared it, the flume was gone. was moving west over summersville, wv. about 20k feet at a fast rate of speed. seemed a lot faster than a airliner.

saw this same object a few years ago over summersville lake but it was a lot lower.
content.summary: Flying silver cylinder with no wings and made no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back deck of our beach resort having a glass of tea with my fiancee when we noticed a bright orange light shine about a mile out north east with a smaller less brighter light shine behind it time approx 11 pm. light then went out. we both looked at each other to analyze what we saw. then approx ten to fifteen minutes later a whole series of lights started popping up right in front of us. orangish red. coming on and off like leds revealing something behind it.... almost really dark gray. couldn't tell if all lights where coming from one object or multiple but it looked big. lights then went out and came back on further south of us 5 mins later briefly and only about 3 of them. after lights went out last time we seen multiple aircraft in they area out where the lights were coming from. we heard loud jets flying over and about 5 to 10 planes all in one area pushing out to sea.
content.summary: 1 bright light started out with a trailing light 15 mins later multiple lights in a pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Va state director, susan swiatek, received an email (4/25/13) directly from the submitter, stating that a large forest fire had burned near his house in the summer of 2012. he later heard a fascinating rumor regarding the fire. it did not escape my notice that his email was from a dept. of homeland security domain. his email stated the following: 

"a new family acquaintance brought up an interesting story that we had not heard previously.

last summer there was a forest fire in the massanutten range which falls under the national park service. it was quite close to our home so we were very aware of it over the weeks that it burned.

we were told today that some witnesses saw a ufo descend into the range and initiate the fire. several local volunteer fire departments, including our rivermont fire department, were, apparently, prevented from entering the fire zone by federals.

i have been a mufon member since the mid 90's and read the magazine religiously. i recall no mention of this.  was there ever any discussion of this event that crossed your path?"

the gentleman wrote the email to me as promptly as he could, but unfortunately, it had already been over a year since the incident. in a subsequent email the witness pointed us to a local newspaper, the warren county report, volume vii, issue 14 �� mid july, 2012. we were able to download a pdf of this paper with some effort: it is a huge 45 meg file. the ufo fire incident was given a front-page mention: "earth, wind, fire - and sky? a tumultuous weather week. did a ufo ��� unidentified falling object ��� start gw forest fire?" the very long article was the feature  article, starting on page 2. the article was a treasure trove of names, maps, etc. to begin researching this incident. two fi's were asked to coordinate their efforts with norm gagnon, star team member: phil reynolds & victor rodriguez. and so the research began, and this ends the introduction by the state director. 
======================================
content.summary: Subject observed large forest fire near his house; newspaper article pointed to witnesses describing a crashing ufo causing the blaze and an object being removed.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject, an ammature astronomer, was watching night sky sunday june 22 at 11pm
subject thought he saw a meteor about 2 inches long disappear, reappear,disappear, reappear, and turn 90 degrees,going west, reappear going in opposite direction and disappear and reappear going in the same south to north direction again before disappearing for good
content.summary: Subject saw what he thought was a meteor  make a 90 degree turn

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon investigator filing at witness request. witness is a 49 year old male,former truck driver,now on disability because of job injury. in august 2013 he was on his porch at his home, when his wife(also witness) brought his attention to a bright white object directly south at about a 45 degree angle to the horizon. it was quite late(11:00 p.M.) and the weather was cloudy and an ongoing lightning storm was in process. it did not have light colors or flashes of planes, which regularly fly over the house. the brother of the witness was also there and joined them on the porch. the object,at its closest, seemed to be size of a quarter or a bit larger at arm's length. it passes in pretty much a straight line path over their house and moved off to the north toward lake ontario.
   when the object was directly overhead, a flash of lightning allowed the witness to see detail of what appeared to be an octagonal dark craft with
darker seams or partitions around its perimeter,perhaps dark windows although witness is not sure of this. as this was a very brief flash, other witnesses apparently did not see this. as the object moved away to the north, it appeared to blink out, disappear from view,not fade out into the distance.
witness felt no particular emotions save curiousity.
    this is one of several encounters witness has had with ufo phenomena. these include an entity encounter in early childhood, and a more recent possible encounter in the last year. these will be followed up by investigator.
content.summary: Dark octagonal object seen over house in t-storm

content.detailedDescription: We were standing in our garden, and looked over the valley to see two objects,very slowly flying over the roof tops. it looked as though they were only a foot above the roof tops, but were obviously alot higher! it was dark, but, the lights were orange and lantern shaped, one at each corner, forming a diamond, you could not see in the centre. on the back were two huge panes of brilliant white lights as if up on struts, i assume this was a power source? there were no other colour lights, and no noise at all! my daughter said to me, as they were becomming visible over the mountain "look mum chinese lanterns". my date is not exactly correct, but the time is and it was roughly 2011/12. after we saw the objects i rang my friend and husband to tell them about it, as the object flew over cwmbran,my friend was in her garden and saw them as well, we both thought it was very eerie. the objects flew on until out of sight, as if they were just cruising.4
content.summary: We watched the two objects come over the houses and just carry on over towards the bristol channel.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject has repeatedly seen blue led colored stars over his home in la habra heights
they look like stars that move across the sky and sometimes flash
they always seem to follow the same course sometimes west to east or southeast toward catalina island. some nights subject sees up to twelve separate sightings of the stars from sundown to iipm  subject has seen 7 ufos on june 19th, 8 on the 20th, 10 on the 21st, 12 on the 22nd, 2 on the 23rd and 2 on the 24th.  subject says they are twice as high as an airplane would fly.
subject wants someone to come to his home so he can show them what he sees,
he has not been able to take pictures since the ufos are so high and fast
subject says the ufo seem to travel a path accelerate sometimes flash, and then disappear
content.summary: Subject is seeing blue led stars over home at sunset

content.detailedDescription: Ad by search donkeyxxad by search donkeyxxi was driving otr on a route through eastern utah down to az. i always have my camera ready because i like to take pictures of the mountains and different rock formations. i came up to the formation "the mexican hat" i took out my camera and took a picture of the mountain because it looked kind of weird to me, like if a big machine had dug up the whole side of the mountain. i then took the second picture with the "mexican hat" in the middle of the frame. when i got home, i put the pictures on my computer. a couple of weeks later when i had time to look at them, i looked in the sky to the left above the mountain in the back, i increased the picture size to just above half way and there is the orb. i did not notice it when i took the picture but it is there now. picture 18 was the first picture of the mountain, it is not in the picture. picture 19 is the one with the orb. i locate it by looking at the antennas on the mountain and then going left to the third peak, then up halfway into the sky. i increase the picture by half, anymore and it will blend back in with the sky.
content.summary: Took pictures of

content.detailedDescription:
In irvine, around 1977, in the fall, subject and husband were awoken by a very bright laser green light at 1 am in the morning
the light filled their home. when they went out side the green butterfly shaped light was shinning over their house. it made no noise, it just hovered there, it appeared to have a pattern in the light, but the light was steady and unwavering. they watched it for two minutes before it just disappeared.
subject did not contact neighbors or authorities because husband did not want to. subject has researched the possibility of the light being a hologram, but none were available in 1977.
content.summary: In 1977 subject saw a neon green light shaped like a butterfly in tustin

content.detailedDescription: 11:30 pm ish.... there were three of us driving on the 5 north when my passenger could barely speak and told me to look up. i must say it was very clear out and there were absolutely no lights ahead of us in the sky prior to this. when i looked up, there were 4 blue lights and some object hoovering about 30 feet above my car. the moon-roof shade was open and we could clearly see the whole object. as soon as we looked up and started to point at the object, it began to fly  away from the car, covering what we discussed and concluded was about a mile at most in 5-10 seconds. the object stopped and started to land. it moved and turned in ways that we all have never seen anything do before. i must clarify this object was bigger than a jet but smaller than a commercial plane. about 10 seconds after it landed there was a helicopter that appeared in the sky ahead moving very fast toward the downed object. there were many other lights in the sky that started being noticed in the next few seconds much higher up in the sky but above where the object landed. this vehicle made absolutely no noise and covered a lot of ground in a very short time. the passenger in the back seat as the object landed became obviously frightened and fell into a deep sleep 20 min after seeing the object. the front passenger and i have had weird visions, tingling, and nervousness, nauseous , and other interesting things since seeing the object...It was like we had to fight something off inside our heads talking to us.
content.summary: On i-5 north. lights directly above our car then landed a mile at most in distance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at approximate 5am, doing some stargazing before sunrise, and the object, roughly northwest, caught my eye. it was a steady, dim orange glowing light that rose up slowly from behind the hill. within a few minutes of hovering the object slowly descended back behind the hill. the estimated coordinates of the area of where it could've been rising from, given my vantage point at the time, is 40.451136, -77.935073
content.summary: Pale orange glowing object rose from behind hill, hovered for a few minutes and then descended.

content.detailedDescription: We went camping around 9 o'clock that night it was between a graveyard  a field and another field in  between the fields was a old paintball course it was around 230 in the morning we are all getting ready for bed it was a really cold  may night  ....... it came and it floated around our tent and stayed around for a few minutes. we heard like a humming noise which made really calm and then it just disappeared  i got out right away to see if there was any thing there like a a joker or our fire later but it was gone ... i also witnessed a huge sighting in moncton nb it was in november/december we witnessed over 1500 of these orbs going down chocolate river in moncton!!!!!!! and no one talk about it!!!! we are freaked out weird stuff keeps happening ... please get back to me thank you.
content.summary: The orb floated over our tent for a few minutes than vanished after it loomed around our tent we felt calm not scared

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car waiting and facing the direction of venus when a blue orb just appears and moves across the sky to the north and then seems to disappear. it was as if it cloaked and decloaked. i found it to be a little strange kind of expecting it to be an airplane and expecting it to appear somewhere else in the sky but it didn't. it actually appeared again 5 min later in the same spot doing the same thing. i knew then it wasn't normal and nothing like i have ever seen.
content.summary: Looking in the direction of venus a blue orb appears moves across the sky and then disappears again

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work in my car waiting to go inside with my car facing east looking at venus when a white light just appears moving to the north and streaking across venus and then disappears or the light just fades away.
the object at first makes you think airplane or falling star but clearły the way it acted was neither. it didn't just come into view it just appeared as if decloaked then moved across the sky as a white light sort of flickered and pulsed then disappeared after about 5 seconds or became cloaked again is the best way to describe it and it didn't reappear again anywhere in the sky after waiting and looking to be sure of what we saw. then we felt as though we saw something out of the ordinary we agreed we saw a ufo.
content.summary: White light appeared in eastern sky streaking across venus just before 5am lasting only about 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette and i saw this orange light only lasted a couple seconds and then disappeared. but then a few seconds later out of the corner of my eye another orange light caught my attention. it was so bright that it caught my attention through the pine tree in our yard. it was coming out of the west and headed east northeast. the only thing i could make out was that it was bright orange and circular. and then the object started dropping these bright lights kind of looked like flares. the whole event lasted a little over five minutes then the object disappeared into the clouds. during and after the event i was very!!!! excited.
content.summary: Bright orange lights one only lasted a couple seconds the second lasted five minutes and dropped these bright lights about four or five.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at approximate 5am, doing some stargazing before sunrise, and the object, roughly northwest, caught my eye. it was a steady, dim orange glowing light that rose up slowly from behind the hill. within a few minutes of the object hovering it slowly descended back behind the hill. the estimated coordinates of the area of where it could've been rising from, given my vantage point at the time, is 40.451136, -77.935073
content.summary: Steady, pale orange light slowly rose, hovered and then descended

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting la mirada, california.  i saw a bright light traveling north to south and it traveled directly above me.  this sighting was for 4 minutes from 9:03-907 pm sunday night on 22 june 2014.  i first noticed the bright light in the northern sky over la mirada regional park.  it was bright and low.  it flew directly overhead and continued towards fullerton.  i was standing about one block south of the park.  i am guessing that around the border of la mirada and fullerton the brightly lite object slowly faded out.  for a few seconds, i could see the city lights reflect off the very dark, black object.  this sighting was unusual in that there was a police helicopter traveling with it and at about the same speed. the helicopter and the brightly lite object were only a few hundred feet apart.  the helicopter was not directly under it, but was slightly west of it.  after both objects passed me and were almost in fullerton, the helicopter made a 90 degree turn to the east passing under the glowing object.  about 10 seconds later, the glowing object slowly faded out over a 4 or 5 second period of time.  that is when i could see the city lights reflect off the dark or black object.  the object looked to be about the same size as the helicopter, even though it was a little higher than the helicopter.  of course i can't say whether the officer in the helicopter saw the glowing object, but it sure looked like the helicopter was following it.
content.summary: Helicopter following a glowing object over la mirada, california on sunday night 22 june

content.detailedDescription:
My mother has asthma and c.O.P.D. which means i smoke on my back porch. every night for several months, going back as far as new year's (estimate, give or take a couple weeks) whenever the skies are clear i observe the exact same craft in a window between the hours of 10pm and 3am. it always appears in the same part of the sky to the southwest, hangs there for no less than an hour, often times longer, before slowly beginning to drift away from my location on a southwest heading. 

to the naked eye it first appears to be a typical commercial aircraft with typical night flying lights. it is only when you look at it long enough that you realize it's not moving in any direction, it simply hangs there in the sky. then it appears to be a commercial aircraft that is stationary in the sky with multiple strobes flashing in very, very rapid succession. through binoculars, a shape or outline of a craft is not possible to make out. what is visible is a single intense yellowish light that occasionally pulses very slowly. on the right of this slowly pulsing yellow light appears to be a sometimes single, sometimes multiple very visible red strobe that flashes in a manner so fast and bright i would almost describe it as aggressive. on occasions when there appears to be multiple red strobes, it appears that one is directly beneath the other, and sometimes it seems a third one is visible on the left side.

also to the left of this yellow "main" light is a single green strobe, which also flashes extremely fast, but slightly slower than the reds. it also often appears as though the craft is either changing shape or possibly rotating on an axis, as often to the naked eye it appears to go from a horizontal series of strobes to a much more compact mass of lights. sometimes through the binoculars it also appears to give off smaller singularly lights, usually the same yellow as the "main" light. these smaller off-shoot lights appear to separate from the main entity of strobes and either very briefly orbit around it or sometimes seem to 'dance' or 'play' with each other before rejoining the main body. these off-shoot events are infrequent and last only a few minutes. 

i watch the object as long as i can before losing visual on it as it drifts farther and farther away into the southwest night sky, always very slowly. my home is located near a small municipal airport which rarely handles traffic larger than a cessna type aircraft. i am also approximately equal distances from philadelphia international, atlantic city international, and dover afb. i have observed a variety of aircraft flying over my house or on a flight path that is nearly over my house for years, always from the south to a north/northeast heading. i know what commercial jets, turbo props, and light aircraft all look and sound like in the sky. i swear to you this is not an airplane, nor a helicopter. it hangs stationary in the sky and moves away, and despite never being able to determine a solid hull or shape or outline, i can best describe its movements and behavior in the sky as being similar to a blimp or some other form of airship, but no such aircraft (to my knowledge) are known to operate in this area, especially late at night.

i live with my mother, and i have kept this from her since the very first time i saw this craft. despite the fact that in her life she has had three different sightings herself (one of which a frighteningly close encounter with a massive craft at treetop level which left her extremely frightened) i decided not to tell her about it until just days ago. i can't tell you why. i just felt it was something best kept to myself. a few days ago i finally told her. during a sighting of the craft i called her to the back porch, pointed it out to her with the naked eye and handed her the binoculars. she sees what i see. unfortunately, our most reliable recording devices for picture and video are our iphones, and between the craft being distant in the sky and the night sky being so dark, the phones cameras are not able to register it. the most recent sighting was tonight, 
june 25, 2014 at 1:30am lasting until approximately 2:20am. i should note that i have never witnessed this object appear in the sky. every time i have seen it, it has already been present upon my stepping outside.

many of my friends believe in ufos and alien life, and that includes myself, but i am not eager for my experiences to be known to others. i know they're up and out there and that's enough for me. but this has been happening for so long with such frequency and consistency, i feel that it would be wrong for me not to file some kind of official report about this as a matter of record, so here it is.
content.summary: Same craft observed in same part of sky (clear nights only) for several months

content.detailedDescription: This is happenning right now over downtown san diego thousands must be seeing this as a plane like sized bright light w similiar altitude is pulsating randomly all sorts of colors with a slow drifting path but mostly stationary the light being emmitted is quite bright and brilliant i have some cel phone vdeo of it that is not that impressive but everyone in the city nmust be seeing this thing
content.summary: Flashing pulsating light bizzare colors not seen in sky

content.detailedDescription:
According to information provided by a family in the  neighborhood of the rio bravo's city, who requested anonymity to the unbelievable situation, they described the event as follows: 

"we were taking pictures of the house we have in reconstruction and really did not see anything, but when we were choosing the pictures to send them to print, find what you see, really do not know that it was 
but if you can say that in this area more strange things, such as passing lights are low rise, things we think are the devil "cited.
content.summary: Flying humanoid: picture taken in rio bravo, tamaulipas mexico

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching a movie when we saw a star like object, which we thought was an airplane at first, moving in a straight path. it did not blink , or have any lights the way an airplane would, and vanished after a minute of observing it. several others, but orange, were spotted two days prior to this.
content.summary: Star-like object over city, vanished within a minute without a trace

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside watering the grass looking at the sky and stars.  when i noticed an object, rectangle in shape, it had no actual color, it seemed to take the color of the sky but with anomalies. it had two rectangle blue glowing lights underneath it. i wasn't sure what i was looking at. i kept staring at it. i thought maybe it was a remote control drone or something. it made no sound at all. i tried to take some pictures with my iphone but the pictures would come out showing anything. it appeared as if it was coming from westminster and heading towards fullerton ca.

the weird thing about this object was the color and no sound. it reminded me of that movie predator when it would turn invisible, but you could still see it. 

i've been out at about the same time to see if i can see it again. no luck.
content.summary: Appeared transparent but had two visible lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work this morning, going east on hwy 12 toward middleton/madison, wi.  to my right i noticed a craft hovering in front of one of the wind turbines.  the traffic was very busy, so i had to keep glancing to my right and then back to the road, so i couldn't stay focused on  it, but it was a tan colored craft, that was stationary.  it was in front of the wind turbine about even with the center of the turbine. i am not a good judge of distance, but i am guessing it was about 100 yards in front of the turbine.  

if no one else saw it, i wouldn't be surprised, because it happened during rush hour time and the traffic is moving quickly. it would have been easier to look at it, if i had been heading east on hwy 12 instead of west. i was unable to get a photo of it.  i saw it, glanced at it a few times and then it was behind me.  i wanted to pull over to look at it, but i had to  get to work.
content.summary: It was a tan color.  i don't know how to describe the shape.  it was machine like.

content.detailedDescription:
location:  m-43 between bangor mi and glendale.                                                              approximately 3 miles west of glendale 
date: sept 29, 2012 saturday at 9:41pm
while driving home from douglas mi.  my girlfriend and i were traveling east on m-43. it was dark and no lights or cars on the highway. a bright light lit up the truck and the entire area around the truck. i could see the trees in the distance on the north side of the road. the light only lasted for a few seconds and then went out. i checked the clock on the radio to see if we gained or lost time. there were no planes or helicopters. there were no sounds-just a light from the sky.  we stopped at our friends��� house and told them.  they were skeptial of what we experienced.
content.summary: Light appeared around truck and surrounding area upto quarter mile
